entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023
